review:
The paper seems interesting and seems to contains relevant material. However, it is not easy to read.

- Section 4.2 is completely obscure. I do not see any importance sampling any weights etc.
Please clarify. 

- Can you also apply a Multiple Importance Sampling scheme or a Generalized  Multiple Importance Sampling scheme in your method? please discuss.

- Maybe the following paper is related with your work:

L. Martino, V. Elvira, "Compressed Monte Carlo for Distributed Bayesian Inference", viXra:1811.0505, 2018.

Please discuss relationships, differences and possible use in your setup.

- In Section 4.4 you refer to an online scheme, maybe you must use a sequential importance sampling scheme there. Please discuss.
